short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your personal AI companion, here to assist you with web, image and document analysis, content generation and social media research.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sign up today and unlock 100 FREE credits to supercharge your adventure with the Wintermute AI Browser Extension! 🌟 🚀

🌟 MAIN FEATURES 🌟

💬 ASK

- Inquire about any aspect of your chosen context: whether it's a web page, custom text, or an uploaded PDF file.
- Enjoy exclusive support for Google Docs, allowing you to analyze and work more efficiently with your documents.
- Summarize, clarify, extract key points, or gain insights from your selected content.
- Upload a PDF and utilize it as a source for context.
- Open PDF full screen in Chrome Side Panel
- Transform your custom text by simplifying, enriching, enhancing, and correcting spelling and grammar, along with other useful tools.
- Image analysis - upload or selected image from any website for image analysis

✏️ GENERATE

- Effortlessly create engaging text content using a diverse range of templates.
- Generate compelling social media marketing (SMM) content, eye-catching ads, and persuasive marketing materials, along with informative blog posts and articles.
- Craft SEO-optimized content that boosts visibility and drives traffic.
- Produce personalized content for everyday use, including emails, drafts, bios, and CVs.

🔎 RESEARCH

REDDIT RESEARCH (BETA)

- Provide your research topic and let Wintermute AI extract the most relevant key insights from Reddit topics and comments.

🔑 Use your own API keys: You can now use Wintermute AI features for free with your own API keys for the most popular AI models - OpenAI GPT-4o, GPT-4o-mini. Anthropic Claude and Google Gemini models are coming soon.

🪙 Flexible Credits Pricing: Enjoy the freedom of a Pay-As-You-Go credits system—no subscriptions required! You only pay for what you use, making it easy to manage your expenses while getting the most out of our services.

🔐 Privacy-First Policy: Your content and data are stored locally in your browser storage.
